tool.name: Structure converter
tool.description: convert gromacs trr and gro formats to dcd and pdb formats
tool.command: ln -s '$gro_input' ./groinp.gro && ln -s '$trr_input' ./trrinp.trr && mdconvert -o ./dcdout.dcd ./trrinp.trr && cp ./dcdout.dcd '$dcdout' && gmx editconf -f ./groinp.gro -o ./pdbout.pdb && cp ./pdbout.pdb '$pdbout'
tool.help:
**What it does**
This tool converts GROMACS trajectory (trr) and structure (gro) files to pdb and dcd file formats.
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
- Trajectory file from GROMACS (trr). - Structure file from GROMACS (gro).
_____
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
- Output files in PDB and DCD formats
